The secondary objective ) investigate cost-effectiveness treatment b ) study variable could moderate/mediate treatment outcome , metacognitions , degree rumination degree depression c ) investigate importance sudden gain treatment outcome Trial Design : Randomized control trial active control waitlist control , also recieve treatment first group finish . Long term follow-up also investigate ( baseline 4-months treatment completion baseline 12-months treatment completion ) . Efficacy Parameters : Penn State Worry Questionnaire ( PSWQ ) Safety Parameters : Adverse Events assessed weekly via internet . Description Trial Subjects : Patients > 18 year old PSWQ score 56 point Number Subjects : 300
